nodes.documentation:
@title RFT Fungible Token interface (ERC-20 compatible)
@notice ERC-20 Token compatible interface
nodes.name: IRFTFT

nodes.documentation:
@dev This emits when Fungible Token is being transfered
This event emits when Fungible Token is transfered to specified address,
may fail in case transferable amount exceeds sender balance or 'from' address
is invalid
nodes.name: Transfer

nodes.documentation:
@dev This emits when Fungible Token is being transfered from specified address
by a owner of tokens or approved address for Fungible Token
nodes.name: Approval
balanceOf
transfer
approve
transferFrom
allowance

attributes.documentation:
@title RFT Fungible Token interface (ERC-20 compatible)
@notice ERC-20 Token compatible interface
attributes.name: IRFTFT

attributes.documentation:
@dev This emits when Fungible Token is being transfered
This event emits when Fungible Token is transfered to specified address,
may fail in case transferable amount exceeds sender balance or 'from' address
is invalid
attributes.name: Transfer

attributes.documentation:
@dev This emits when Fungible Token is being transfered from specified address
by a owner of tokens or approved address for Fungible Token
attributes.name: Approval
balanceOf
transfer
approve
transferFrom
allowance

params._operator: - Address of approved operator for Fungible Token

params._amount: - The approval amount of Fungible Token

balanceOf(address).details: Fungible Token amount is a supply for Non-Fungible Token value, may fail in case _address is invalid

transfer(address,uint256).details: Throws if token owner hasn't got enough tokens

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Throws if token owner hasn't got enough tokens or  msg.sender is not owner or approved operator

allowance(address,address).notice: Returns approved Fungible Token amount for specified operator address Throws if _owner or _operator is invalid address, or _owner hasn't approved token for specified _operator

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve specified address as operator for token distributing Throws if _spender is invalid address or token owner hasnt' got  tokens equal to _amount

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns value of specified address of Fungible Token
